This is maddening.  My computer clock is being affected by the game 
Gladiator.  Apparantly, I'm the only person who hashad this problem.

Does anyone else out there play Gladiator and have a time-sychronizer 
on his/her computer?  I need to know if I am still the only way 
experiencing this problem.
